simple.gui.container

Class ScrollableJPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • simple.gui.container.ScrollableJPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SqlExplorer

    public class ScrollableJPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements javax.swing.Scrollable
    Allows a JPanel to be added to a JScrollPane.
    Found out soon after making this class that I had goofed in my layout. While this class is no longer necessary, it still does a slightly better job than the default.
    Created: ??
    Author:
    Kenneth Pierce
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
